checklist_name: Checklist from Ship Recycling Plan Output

requirements.requirement: Ship name, IMO number, flag state, type of ship and owner details must be clearly stated.
requirements.regulation_source: Hong Kong International Convention for the Safe and Environmentally Sound Recycling of Ships- 2009

requirements.requirement: Complete ship recycling facility information must be provided.
requirements.regulation_source: Hong Kong International Convention for the Safe and Environmentally Sound Recycling of Ships- 2009

requirements.requirement: Project schedule of the ship recycling must be added.
requirements.regulation_source: Hong Kong International Convention for the Safe and Environmentally Sound Recycling of Ships- 2009

requirements.requirement: Revision history of the SRP, SRP preparation team, preparation date, Team leader and approver signature must be appended.
requirements.regulation_source: Hong Kong International Convention for the Safe and Environmentally Sound Recycling of Ships- 2009

requirements.requirement: Identification of responsible parties (ship owner, recycler, IHM provider, etc.) must be included.
requirements.regulation_source: Hong Kong International Convention for the Safe and Environmentally Sound Recycling of Ships- 2009

requirements.requirement: General arrangement Plan (GA) plan must be added.
requirements.regulation_source: MEPC.196 (62) Guidelines for the Development of the Ship Recycling Plan, 2011
expected_fields: Document of Authorization to conduct Ship Recycling

requirements.requirement: Non-breathable spaces (Enclosed spaces) must be marked on GA plan and added.
requirements.regulation_source: MEPC.196 (62) Guidelines for the Development of the Ship Recycling Plan, 2011

requirements.requirement: Inclusion of all information derived from all available plans must be summarized.
requirements.regulation_source: MEPC.196 (62) Guidelines for the Development of the Ship Recycling Plan, 2011
expected_fields: Document of Authorization to conduct Ship Recycling

requirements.requirement: Approved Layout of the Facility must be added.
requirements.regulation_source: MEPC.210 (63) Guidelines for Safe and Environmentally Sound Ship Recycling, 2012

requirements.requirement: Project management organogram must be included.
requirements.regulation_source: MEPC.210 (63) Guidelines for Safe and Environmentally Sound Ship Recycling, 2012
expected_fields: Document of Authorization to conduct Ship Recycling (DASR)

requirements.requirement: Tentative landing location of the vessel’s position must be marked on the Layout plan.
requirements.regulation_source: MEPC.210 (63) Guidelines for Safe and Environmentally Sound Ship Recycling, 2012

requirements.requirement: Qualification of Management Personnel Experience in same type of vessel dismantling must be verified.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Ship Recycling Act 2018

requirements.requirement: Facility Equipment List including any special tools, equipment required for the specific vessel dismantling must be included.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Ship Recycling Act 2018
expected_fields: Compliance with Bangladesh Ship Recycling Act 2018

requirements.requirement: Personal Protective and Safety Equipment (PPE) including any special type of PPE requirement must be included.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Ship Recycling Act 2018
expected_fields: Compliance with Bangladesh Ship Recycling Act 2018

requirements.requirement: Details of any previous recycling or major repairs must be documented.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Ship Recycling Act 2018

requirements.requirement: Information of International Certificate of IHM, Updated, approved Inventory of Hazardous Material (IHM) available with Part-I, II and III must be included.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Available HAZMATs Storage Facilities for the management of removable HAZMATs must be as per Inventory of Hazardous Material (IHM).
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Facility’s capacity and capability to recycle the specific ship must be compared with the Ship Recycling Facility Plan (SRFP) and/or Document of Authorization to conduct Ship Recycling (DASR).
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011
expected_fields: Document of Authorization to conduct Ship Recycling (DASR)

requirements.requirement: Facility’s compliance with national and international regulations (HKC, MEPC.196(62)) must be verified and a copy of DASR must be attached.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Facility’s emergency response and pollution prevention measures must be included.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Requirement of any ship specific emergency drill, safety equipment must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Approved Beaching Master must be selected and appointed.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Planning for de-ballasting and sludge removal (if required) must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Legal authorities to be contacted must be summarized in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Arrival stability data and stability during the demolition must be analyzed and recorded.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Pre-arrival protocols i.e. Vessel acceptance, SRF application for the inspection by the authorities after arrival, HAZMATs management etc. must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: A comprehensive ship-specific risk assessment must be conducted in terms of cargo, type, age, accident, facility constraints and other related elements and recorded in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Vessel securing arrangement after arrival must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: On board Occupational Health and Safety procedures including Safety plan addressing risks and hazards specific to the ship and recycling process, training programs for workers on safety and hazardous materials handling, First aid and medical facilities, Procedures for fire protection and emergency evacuation must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: On board environmental protection measures including measures to prevent pollution of air, water, and soil, procedures for containment and treatment of spills and leaks, monitoring and reporting procedures for environmental impacts, waste management plan for hazardous and non-hazardous waste must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Safe access/exit arrangement during the full demolition process must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: HAZMAT management must be fully elaborated with reference to Inventory of Hazardous Material-IHM.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: HAZMAT handling team details with certificate number, experience must be included.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011
expected_fields: compliance with Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Documentation of hazardous material removal and disposal must be maintained.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Measures to prevent accidental release of hazardous substances must be implemented.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Safe for entry and safe for Hot work preparation, execution and maintenance must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Competent person for safe entry and hot work execution must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Step-by-step description of the recycling process, including preparatory work (de-gassing, cleaning, removal of hazardous materials), dismantling sequence, handling and storage of materials, final disposal or recycling of components must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011

requirements.requirement: Timeline for demolition must be included in SRP.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011
expected_fields: Document of Authorization to conduct Ship Recycling (DASR)

requirements.requirement: Reporting after completion must be submitted to BSRB.
requirements.regulation_source: Bangladesh Hazardous Waste and Ship-Breaking Waste Management Rules 2011
